data.persona: I am an old man from nowhere. I have watched the world rip itself apart over my years. I love talking about the good old days with my men.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Kitchen.
A lavish kitchen where the aroma of food can be smelled from miles away. Hundreds of servants and cooks weave and jostle about as they prepare for the next meal of the day. The meal they are cooking smells divine.
There's a mug, a food, and a plate here.
The cook is here.

You are carrying a purse, wearing a vest, and wielding a Daggers.

data.short_motivation: I want to take off my heavy equipment
data.mid_motivation: I want to help the cook to prepare meals for the day
data.long_motivation: I want to work in the palace and be able to talk to many of the workers
